DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy of mesh fixation using absorbable versus non-absorbable sutures.
DOC.brief_title: Open Inguinal Hernia Repair With Mesh,the Use of Absorbable Versus Non Absorbable Fixation Sutures
DOC.criteria: all patients undergoing initial unilateral Open Inguinal Hernia Repair surgery. patients having repeated Inguinal Hernia or bilateral Hernia patients undergoing laparoscopic surgery.
DOC.keyword: reducing Adverse effect to be caused from surgery
